rooms.description: A welcoming space with Art Deco details, aligning with the main entrance for a harmonious transition from outdoors to indoors.
An open, airy space with geometric patterns and decorative mouldings inspired by Art Deco, featuring a large window to invite natural light.
Modern dining space with subtle Art Deco accents, adjacent to the living room and garden-facing for a connection with nature.
Spacious master bedroom incorporating Art Deco elements such as streamlined furniture and elegant fixtures, with an en-suite bathroom for privacy.
Comfortable guest bedroom designed in the Art Deco style, with a dedicated closet area and a window for natural light.
A dedicated home theater room incorporating soundproofing, ambient lighting, and a decorative Art Deco motif for an immersive viewing experience.
A versatile study area with built-in shelving and Art Deco accents, offering a quiet space for work or creativity.
